name: KeeDa
description:
KeeDa

BUG is called KeeDa in Hindi language in India.

Story - 

The KeeDa was playing under the sun and he was having too much fun. 

But suddenly he realized, now he have to run,

as his Mom would be waiting for him to have lunch.

The special thing was that his Mom had cooked KeeDa's favorite food for today's lunch. I won't tell you, what it is. Maybe KeeDa shows you his food when you help him to reach his house on time.

Why he needs your help ?

KeeDa needs your help because he has selected a shortcut path, which passes through the jungle & rocks,  he is not aware about the difficulties and challenges waiting for him.

He is a small ladybird / ladybug, with a shiny red shell covered with black spots, which can be easily spotted by his predators and the sad part is he can't fly like other ladybugs, as his wings are too small to fly. But whenever he uses them, he seems to be gliding, so he needs your help to reach home. 

And most important, he is Cute! 

So, you have to help him and you'll enjoy this journey too. : )

Game Controls :

  A : Move Left

  D : Move Right

KeeDa is a game based on the theme BUG for GitHub Game Off 2021 JAM.

This is first game I have ever created. I would love to hear your feedback & comments.

Thanks for reading, hope you would enjoy this game.

Made By :  Yash   &   Utkarsh

Twitter : @_code4Y

GitHub  : https://github.com/code4Y/keeda-github-game-off-2021
